subject: Re: Jagged Alliance 2 Source Code
body:
Dennis Schridde  writes:

> Trying again anyway, since when I don't get answers from anywhere

You could try a lawyer. After all, as is pointed out frequently, this
list is largely comprised of people unqualified to offer legal advice.

-- 
 \     "I know you believe you understood what you think I said, but I |
  `\         am not sure you realize that what you heard is not what I |
_o__)                                  meant."  -- Robert J. McCloskey |
Ben Finney


--
